summary: Where the plan is to make Drew fall in love with her and she is to dump him and make him feel the same torment that he put her through, but things go awry when Mel really falls in love with him.
cast: Carly Pope|Brian Austin Green|Sara Rue|Gina Tognoni|Sherry Miller|David Lipper|Adam Greydon Reid|Matthew Edison|Mallory Margel|Gage Knox|Martha MacIsaac|Megan Park|Susan Aceron|Amanda Brugel|Frank Chiesurin|Derek Gilroy|Steven McCarthy|Joel McNichol|Alex Nussbaum|Scott Yaphe
title: This Time Around
